column1:
Solution to the corona virus: 
-Make me ruler of china
-I will block transport to stop the spreading
And....

- I ban eating shit
Broker headline “Amorepacfic to speed up strengthening eComm strategy amid coronavirus”. More like peddling hard to catch up to the western brands.
